sentence.Network_en: It has also asked Britain and the United States to intercede.
sentence.Network_cn: 它也请了英国与美国进行斡旋。

sentence.Network_en: They asked my father to intercede with the king on their behalf.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们请我父亲为他们向国王求情。

sentence.Network_en: He was quickly snubbed when he tried to intercede.
sentence.Network_cn: 当他试着说情时很快被制止了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根联想记忆法词汇教程(五)|联想记忆法背单词 ... intent n. 企图，打算 intercede v. 调停，求情 interfere v. 干涉，干预；妨碍.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... concession 让步；退位 intercede 调停；仲裁 precede 在先，优于.
张红岩TOEFL ... intensive adj. 集中的 intercede v. 调停，调解 intercept v. 中途拦截，阻止.
英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... excessive 过多,过度的 intercede 说情,调停 precede 在前,先行.

list.abs: ...各种雕刻题词 incribe sculpt chisel carve engrave各种仲裁 intercede mediate arbitrate各种仲裁者 umpire arbitrater intercessor moderator refe.
then Samuel said , " Assemble all Israel at Mizpah and I will intercede with the Lord for you .撒母耳说:“要使以色列众人聚集在米斯巴,我好为你们祷告耶和华。
He interceded in the family dispute ., 他调解家庭争端.
it resumed flying after Australia's federal industrial-relations tribunal interceded and told both sides to reach a settlement .在澳大利亚联邦产业关系法庭调解并让双方达成协议后澳航才恢复航班。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French intercéder or Latin intercedere 'intervene', from inter- 'between' + cedere 'go'

entry.def: If you intercede with someone, you try to persuade them to forgive someone or end their disagreement with them.

example.ex: They asked my father to intercede with the king on their behalf...
example.tran: 他们请我父亲为他们向国王求情。

example.ex: He had occasionally tried to intercede for me...
example.tran: 他有时候也极力为我说情。

means.word_mean: 1. act between parties with a view to reconciling differences;

auth_sentence.content: I'll try to intercede with those bad people.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'll try to intercede with those bad people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'll try to intercede with those bad people.

auth_sentence.content: He prayed to the saint to intercede on his behalf.
auth_sentence.res_content: He prayed to the saint to intercede on his behalf.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He prayed to the saint to intercede on his behalf.

auth_sentence.content: Is there any chance the military decides to intercede in the conflict?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is there any chance the military decides to intercede in the conflict?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is there any chance the military decides to intercede in the conflict?

stems_affixes.word_buile: antecede[v.先行,先于]+ent……的→adj.先行的;以前的
un无+precedent[n.先例;惯例]+ed……的→无先例的
precede[v.在先,优于]+ent→预先走的东西→先例
pro在前+ced行走,前进+ure表名词→在前面走完的程序
ac+ced行走,前进+e→和别人走在一起→答应
ante前+ced行走,前进+e→走在前面→先行

stems_affixes.value_cn: 承认;容许;[比赛结束前]认输;退让
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+ced行走,前进+e→共同向后走一步→让步
inter在……中间+ced行走,前进+e→在二者中间走→调解
pre预先+ced行走,前进+e→预先走→优走
re后+ced行走,前进+e→向后走→撤退
se分开+ced行走,前进+e→分开走→脱离

sentences.en: intercede with the governor for a condemned man
sentences.cn: 替犯人在州长面前说情
